author: James Van Straten, AI Boost
title: H100 Group Targets $79 Million Raise to Power Bitcoin Strategy
description: Blockstream CEO shares details with CoinDesk on strategic convertible loan backing bitcoin-focused treasury play.
content: H100 Group (H100), a Swedish health-technology company, said it reached an agreement that could see Blockstream CEO Adam Back lend it as much as 750 million kronor ($79 million) to support its long-t… [+939 chars]
